item.title: MoBu Script - Mirror Characterization
item.description:
Often in MotionBuilder I get a character whose pose needs some adjustments for it to be properly characterized. Once I adjust one side, it’s always cumbersome to manually repeat everything on the other side. So I scripted a simple tool, which gets the bones from the current character definition and mirrors it, be it left to right or right to left.

It’s just a simple script that I use on my workflow. I cannot assure it’s bug free, nor that it works on versions other than 2015 and 2016. Suggestions and feedback are very welcome, though.

Download script.

Cheers!
